definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: Plane reservations for New Zealand are cheaper when you go out of season.
sentences.chinese: 淡季时订纽西兰的机位较便宜。

sentences.english: The moa browsed in giant wingless herds across the southern island.
sentences.chinese: 巨大无翼鸟群飞越纽西兰南岛。

sentences.english: In 1999, the first Buddhist Youth Camp was held at the tsi Ming Temple.
sentences.chinese: 一九九九年举办纽西兰慈明寺第一届青年佛学营。

sentences.english: Roasted New Zeland lamb, spiced bread crumbs, garlic lemon sauce.
sentences.chinese: 炉烤纽西兰小羔羊排裹香料面包粉佐蒜味柠檬酱汁。

sentences.english: I'm so proud to be a New Zealander standing here.
sentences.chinese: 我很骄傲身为一位纽西兰人站在这里。

sentences.english: New Zealanders proudly display their kiwi , a native flightless bird.
sentences.chinese: 纽西兰人则骄傲地展示他们的鹬鸵，一种不会飞的鸟。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Auckland and Rotorua on NZ.
sentences.chinese: 纽西兰航空公司来回奥克兰至罗托鲁瓦机票。

sentences.english: The preservation of Maori benefited from the support and efforts of Maori people.
sentences.chinese: 纽西兰毛利语的保护牵涉主体团体的投入和支持。

sentences.english: New Zealand's air force is helping to search for bodies and to transport medical and other aid.
sentences.chinese: 纽西兰空军正协助寻找尸体，并运送医药和其它援助。

sentences.english: Sydney Harbor Bridge in Australia and the Skytower in New Zealand are both flooded with people.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲的雪梨大桥及纽西兰的天空之塔都会涌入许多人。

sentences.english: Mary's Church in Auckland, during his state funeral January 22, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 这场国葬在纽西兰奥克兰的圣玛莉教堂内举行。

sentences.english: New Zealand is one of the most beautiful places we’ve ever visited.
sentences.chinese: 纽西兰是我们走过最美的地方之一。

sentences.english: Humpbacks form the backbone of a lucrative whale-watching industry in Australia and New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 座头鲸是澳洲与纽西兰赏鲸业的丰厚收入来源。

definition: Australia/abbr. for 澳大利亞洲|澳大利亚洲[Ao4 da4 li4 ya4 Zhou1]
Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
